data.title: Sandy Martinez
data.meta_description: South Texas Neuropsychological is a neuropsychology practice focused on providing high-quality services. We currently provide psychological and neuropsychological assessment and consultation, as well as psychological counseling/psychotherapy services to adults and their families.
data.text: Sandy has been working as the Business Administrator for South Texas Neuropsychology since 2010. She manages business operations, serves as a liaison for referral sources, oversees patient scheduling and records, and promotes business development and growth. She completed her Bachelor of Arts degree in Education with specialization in Early Childhood, Elementary and Special Education. She completed her Master of Science degree in Educational Administration and Leadership. She previously worked for Northside Independent School District for eighteen years as a teacher and campus administrator. She is married and has three children.
